edu.umd.cloud9.webgraph.normalizer

Interface AnchorTextNormalizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnchorTextBasicNormalizer

    public interface AnchorTextNormalizer
    An interface for normalizing lines of anchor text. A Normalizer consists of an stemming, removing the stop-word, and other processes that lines of anchor text would need to go through, such as converting to lower case, etc.
    Author:
    Nima Asadi

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String normalize(String anchor) 
      String process(String anchor)
      An auxiliary method which performs any other types of normalization.
      String removeStopWords(String anchor)
      Removes the stop-words
      String stem(String anchor)
      Stemmer.

    • Method Detail

      • stem

        String stem(String anchor)
        Stemmer.
        Parameters:
        anchor - original line of anchor text
        Returns:
        A line of anchor text where every word from the original anchor text is stemmed.

      • normalize

        String normalize(String anchor)
        Parameters:
        anchor - original line of anchor text
        Returns:
        A line of anchor text where the anchor text is normalized (lower-case, etc.)

      • removeStopWords

        String removeStopWords(String anchor)
        Removes the stop-words
        Parameters:
        anchor - original line of anchor text
        Returns:
        A line of anchor text without the stop-words

      • process

        String process(String anchor)
        An auxiliary method which performs any other types of normalization.
        Parameters:
        anchor - original line of anchor text
        Returns:
        A processed line of anchor text.
